list.name: Arga
list.quote: As long as I've used dump trucks from THEI, operations at the site have been smoother. The equipment is durable and fuel-efficient. The 24-hour service is also really fast; every problem is handled immediately. The after-sales bonus is also cool; my office operational car gets free service from TJM Auto Care. Overall, I'm very satisfied with THEI!

list.name: Shambat Kumar
list.quote: Our forklifts work 10 hours non-stop every day and usually wear out quickly, but the units from THEI are very strong. What makes it convenient is that THEI technicians are diligent in following up and there are always service reminders, so we never miss one. It's the first time I bought a forklift and got bonuses like free coating, spooring, and maintenance for the office car too!

list.name: Rama
list.quote: I thought it would be a hassle to claim the warranty when my crane had an error on site, but the THEI team arrived in just 4 hours and the service was completed immediately at no extra cost. The craziest part is, I also got a TJM Auto Care membership bonus for the company car. This is the first time I've found an after-sales program this serious, kudos to THEI.

list.name: Richard
list.quote: At first, I only tried one unit, but it turned out the equipment was fuel-efficient and the service was fast. As soon as there was a problem, the THEI team came right away. Now I've added more units, and work is stress-free. There are also many bonuses; even the operational car gets serviced. Amazing, I didn't expect service like this in Indonesia.
